title: Paris Hilton & Nicky Look Somber Leaving Grandpa Barron's Funeral
text:
Paris Hilton and her sister, Nicky, said their final goodbyes to their grandfather with a star-studded funeral.

The jet-setting DJ was photographed leaving Barron Hilton's memorial at Good Shepard Church in Beverly Hills on Saturday.

View photos

Paris wore an all black outfit including a blazer and skirt with matching oversized shades.

She was seen clutching onto a booklet from the funeral with Barron's face on it.

Nicky & Husband:

View photos

While Paris appeared to attend the funeral solo, Nicky was photographed leaning on her husband following the ceremony honoring her grandpa.

Sporting a black dress, the mom of two held onto James Rothschild as the pair walked away from the church.

Paris' Parents:

View photos

Paris and Nicky's parents, Rick and Kathy, were photographed after the funeral as well.

Rick, whose father was Barron, looked at peace following the church service.

Inside:

View photos
